name: Survivor Warrior-Vampire.io
summary:
Shaklas Continent is a magical world full of fantasy!
Awakened by a magical curse, you must embark on a difficult road to explore the world.
Grab your weapons, cast your spells, and join other survivors to defeat powerful enemies!
Upgrade equipment and talents to expand your own advantages and create your secret recipe for victory
Wandering in survival and exploration, uncover the mysteries of each story.
